name: The Murder of Thomas
description:
You've been framed for the murder of a mysterious person. After finding a random bloodstain, your life is suddenly going downhill! Maybe you should try to talk and help as many people as possible, or you can just accept the charges against you.

This was my first game for a computer science project, so go easy on me I guess. Or don't, I don't really care.  Also, obviously, the music isn't mine and all rights go to their respective owners. 

(edit: the music won't start so whatever I guess)
